import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const Movie = () => { const location = useLocation(); const id = location.pathname.slice(7); const [movie, setMovie] = React.useState(""); React.useEffect(() => { axios .get(`/api/movies/${id}`) .then((re) => re.data) .then((data) => setMovie(data)); }, ""); console.log(movie, "moviee"); const handlerClick = () => { axios.put("/api/favorites/addToFavorites", { imdbID: id }) .then((data) => console.log(data)) } return ( <>

{"myOMDB"}

Check our awesome team memwhite

); }; export default Movie;
